Aurora Innovation (Self-driving cars) | FT | Site-Reliability/Business Analyst/HR Manager | San Francisco/Palo Alto/Pittsburgh, PA | Onsite

Aurora was founded by the original leaders of Google/Waymo's, Tesla's and Uber's autonomous driving programs; recently Jinnah Hosein, founding member of Google's Site Reliability Engineering Group, joined us as our VP of Software Engineering. Together, our leaders have taken their collective learnings from these companies to create the best self-driving platform on the market.

We're looking to bring on our very first site-reliability engineer to develop, manage, and deploy our kubernetes-cloud environment using Google Cloud. This would be the first of it's kind over here at Aurora and this role would have tremendous impact on our cloud infrastructure!

We're looking to bring on our very first Business Analyst to take our analytical reporting to the next level! This individual would be working cross-functionally across our strategy, finance, operations, & engineering teams to track and measure KPIs and provide insights and inform strategy for making key business decisions.

We're looking to bring on our first HR Manager/HR Business Partner on the West Coast to develop, roll out, and manage HR Programs as well as provide day to day employee relations support for the entire company.

If interested in any of these roles, please email jsproul@aurora.tech with your resume.

We are hiring across the board for a number of engineering and non-engineering roles as well and so please check them out here: https://aurora.tech/jobs/
